x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Fresh graduates relocating for jobs face challenges in finding safe, affordable, and verified accommodations. Existing solutions lack transparency in pricing, amenities, and reviews, leading to poor living experiences or scams. There is no centralized platform that connects verified property owners with students while ensuring trust and affordability.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: StayConnect – Smart Accommodation Portal for Fresh Graduates
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

StayConnect will be a web and mobile platform with:

  • Two login types: Property Owners and Students.
  • Features:
    • Location-based search (City + Area).
    • Filters for budget, amenities, and ratings.
    • Verified listings and tenant reviews.
    • Map integration for commute planning.
    • Secure messaging between students and property owners.
  • Community Features: Discussion forums and Q&A for students.

ServiceNow products 

  • App Engine: For building custom workflows and portal.
  • Flow Designer: For automating verification and notifications.
  • Integration Hub: For integrating maps and payment gateways.
  • Mobile App Builder: For mobile-first experience.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with Google Maps API for location services.
  • Secure payment gateway for booking.
  • Identity verification APIs for user trust.
  • Hosting infrastructure for scalability.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring data accuracy and verification of property listings.
  • Preventing fake reviews and fraudulent activities.
  • Managing scalability for multiple cities.
  • Building trust among users in early stages.
